participant_1.background:
I enjoyed a week at the beach, swimming, sunbathing, and reading.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
i used to own several casinos.
i like rollerblading.
i have a rose tattooed on my right ankle.

participant_2.background:
I have a lot of interests that I like to spend time on, and I sometimes have trouble keeping up with my family.
my dad works at the mill and my mom is a teacher.
I'm not sure what my weight is because I don't have a scale, but I'm pretty sure I'm getting bigger.
i like tall men.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

content.text: Hi! I'm pretty bored. How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing well. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, not really doing much. I went to the beach last week and had a great time.
That sounds really fun! I love the beach. I used to go there a lot when I was younger.
Me too! I have a rock collection that I started when I was a kid. I still add to it when I go to the beach.
That's really cool! I love collecting things. I used to collect seashells when I was younger.
That's a great collection! I used to collect seashells too, but I lost them all when I moved.
That's too bad! I wish I still had mine.
Me too! I would love to see them again.
Maybe we can go to the beach together sometime and collect some more seashells.
That would be fun! I would love to do that.
Great! We can make a day of it and go swimming too.
Sounds like a perfect day to me!
